scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd ./server && npm run start:dev" "cd ./client && npm run start:dev"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "cd ./server && npm run start:prod" "cd ./client && npm run start:prod"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd ./server && npm run build" "cd ./client && npm run build"
scripts.launch:dev: concurrently "cd ./server && npm run launch:dev" "cd ./client && npm run start:dev"
